name: Mother Mary Collar and Charm Bracelet in One
description:
Halleluja! This glorious silver plated collar features a wire wrapped black onyx centre piece and is dripping with bits of chains, vintage gold and silver charms, including a Mary medallion, Gemini pendant, silver & aquamarine cross, pyrite stone and 5 lucky citrine charms to bring you wealth, health and good luck.

As if that wasn't enough the charms are on a chain which is easily removable from the collar to become a bad ass charm bracelet. Pretty amazing, we know!

The length of the bracelet is adjustable and closes with a new sliver plated lobster clasp and large ring.

This collar fits very close around the base of the neck, the opening is flexible and if your neck is 32cm (12.5") or less it will fit you.

~ONE OF A KIND ~

HAND MADE WITH LOVE & CARE
using reclaimed, vintage and new materials.

Materials: silver plate, wire, stones, leather, metal chains, charms

Diamater-collar: 10 cm (3.9")
Longest charm(horn/silver tear drop): 4.25 cm (1.7")
Citrine charms: 1cm long (0.4")

All measurements are approximate.

Please contact us if you have any questions about this item or the shop in general.

name: Just Married Charm Bracelet
description:
Every gal needs her own charm bracelet. This bracelet is made of 5 mixed metal chains and 4 special charms including a vintage bride and groom charm, a suitcase, a golden heart and Big Ben charm. This bracelet was inspired by my parents who took their honeymoon in England 35 years ago.

>ONE OF A KIND<

HAND MADE WITH LOVE & CARE
using reclaimed, vintage and new materials

Bracelet length:19cm (7.5")
Longest charm-heart+chains: 3cm (1.25") long

Please contact us if you have any questions about this item or the shop in general.

Remember to read shipping policies before purchasing an item.

name: Mother Mary Charm Bracelet
description:
Every gal needs a unique charm bracelet. This bracelet is made of 5 mixed chains and 4 special charms including a Mary medallion, 10K gold Capricorn charm, tea pot, and "77" charm. I call it Mother Mary because it reminds of my mom, who inspired me to make these charm bracelets many years ago. This bracelet fastens with a lobster style clasp and ring.
 
>ONE OF A KIND<

HAND MADE WITH LOVE & CARE
using reclaimed, vintage and new materials

Bracelet length: 20cm (8")
Biggest charm-"77": 2.5cm (1") long
Smallest charm-Capricorn: 1cm (.5") across

name: Milagro Bangle - Cielo
description:
Each set of bangles comes with one metal Milagro charm from the city of San Miguel De Allende, Mexico. Each charm comes with two reclaimed skinny metal bangles and is accented with a piece of turquoise, lapis lazuli or vintage resin beads.

$3 CAD from each Milagro Bangle sold will be donated to FINO A.C. a non-profit organization which promotes education in the rural area surrounding San Miguel De Allende by offering free after school programs, scholarships, access to computers and a library. Their goal is to reduce the alarming rates of drop-out and out-migration of young Mexicans. 

>ONE OF A KIND<

HAND MADE WITH LOVE AND CARE
using reclaimed, vintage, found and new materials.

Please visit their website to find out more about FINO www.FINOMEX.org

Materials: mixed metal, lapiz lazuli, turquoise, vintage beads, silver, brasss or steel findings

Inside diameter: approx. 6.7cm (2.5") // fits most

Please contact us if you have any questions about this item or the shop in general.

Remember to read our Shipping Policy before purchasing an item.

Donations to FINO are made through the San Miguel Community Foundation www.sanmiguelcommunityfoundation.org

name: Crystal Waters Necklace
description:
Ice ice baby! 6 clear quartz crystals hang from a thick vintage rolo chain. Tiger's Eye stone charms hang between each crystal to bring you back down to earth. The cut crystal wands hang below the collar bones and accent decolletage beautifully. They are even more reflective and magical in person. This necklace closes at the back with a matching gold tone toggle clasp.

~ONE OF A KIND~

HAND MADE WITH LOVE AND CARE
using reclaimed, vintage, and new materials

Materials: Quartz, tiger's eye, brass & gold plated findings

Chain: 43cm long (17")
Crystals: 2.5-3cm long (1")

Measurements are approximate

FREE shipping on your 2ND item! (See Shipping Policy for details)

Please contact us if you have questions about this item or the shop in general.

Remember to read shipping policies before purchasing an item.

name: Aphrodite Necklace
description:
Aphrodite - goddess of love, beauty and pleasure. This necklace makes me want to be on the beach...in Greece! The combination of thick vintage brass chains, Romanesque coin charms, white resin beads and chunks of lapis lazuli and turquoise coloured howlite are truly fit for a goddess. Every one of the five coins are a little bit different. Oh, and it makes lovely chiming sounds as you frolick in the sand. 

This necklace closes with a new gold plated toggle clasp.

Matching charm bracelet also available!

~ONE OF A KIND~

HAND MADE WITH LOVE AND CARE
using reclaimed, vintage and new materials

Materials: brass, gold plated and metal findings, lapis lazuli, howlite, resin

Length: 45.5cm (18")
Coins: 2.5-3cm (1"-1.25")

Measurements are approximate.

Please contact us if you have any questions about this item or the shop in general.

Remember to read shipping policies before purchasing an item.

description:

name: Taj Mahal Sunrise Necklace
description:
The marble look of these dyed howlite stones reminds me of the magic of the Taj Mahal at sunrise as it absorbs the pinks and purples of the sky. Chunky donut shaped purple howlite beads paired with graduated vintage gold painted beads and reclaimed gold tone chain create a truly majestic feel. This necklace closes at the back with a large ring clasp and has an adjustable length.

~ONE OF A KIND~

HAND MADE WITH LOVE AND CARE
using reclaimed, vintage, and new materials

Materials: Howlite, acrylic, wire, brass, metal

Length: 45.5-54.5cm (18"-21.5")
Howlite bead: 3cm (1.25")

>Please store this necklace out of direct sunlight to prevent fading.

name: Pyrite Princess Necklace
description:
Pyrite (Fool's Gold) captures both earth and fire energies; a perfect tool to assist in balancing the root or base chakra. Pyrite helps one to communicate more openly and honestly, providing both emotional and physical protection. An excellent shield stone, pyrite removes negativity from the aura and helps one to concentrate.

This unique necklace is made from with black tone chain, silver and metallic findings and a natural pyrite stone.

HAND MADE WITH LOVE AND CARE.

Length (of entire necklace): 91cm (36")
Width (at cross bar): 4cm (1.6")
Size of pyrite stone: 1cm (0.4")

Measurements are approximate.
